column2: (1) All figures are for the Māori ethnic group census usually resident population.
(2) Information is unavailable for the Māori ethnic group prior to 1991.  Information about
Māori collected in the censuses prior to 1991 was on the basis of descent/origin.  From
1991 onwards, ethnic group and Māori descent have been collected separately.
Note: This data has been randomly rounded to protect confidentiality.
Individual figures may not add up to totals, and values for the same data may vary in different tables.
